name: eServeCloud Chat
author: Team eServeCloud

sections.description:
With the eServeCloud (official) plugin, you can now:

-Quickly integrate the help widget into your WordPress site or blog
-convert chat or form submission on your WordPress site into eServeCloud tickets
-allow users on WordPress to seamlessly login to your support portal easily
sections.installation:
1) Download the latest version of the ‘eServeCloud (official)’ plugin from the WordPress plugin directory.
2) Extract the zip and upload the “eServeCloud-chat-support” directory to your /wp-content/plugins directory.
3) Go to the ‘Plugins’ page in your admin section and activate the plugin.
4) You now have a new admin menu ‘eServeCloud’ in your WordPress admin menu bar. Click on it and configure the settings.
5) To view Privacy Policy of eServeCloud please visit https://www.eservecloud.com/terms-of-service/
sections.faq:
1) Do I need coding skill to use this plugin ?
No, Just install plugin anded add code that is from your eserve cloud dashboRD
sections.reviews:
Effortless Customer Engagement

By Ketan Umretiya (ketanumretiya030) on February 21, 2024

eServeCloud Chat is a live chat software designed to help businesses communicate with their customers in real-time. It offers features such as chat routing, canned responses, chat history, and visitor tracking. Here's a brief review based on common criteria:

  1. Ease of Use: eServeCloud Chat is typically user-friendly, with a simple interface for both agents and customers. Setting up the chat widget on your website is usually straightforward.
  2. Features: It offers essential features like chat routing, canned responses, and chat history. However, it may lack some advanced features compared to other chat software.
  3. Integration: It can integrate with popular WordPress systems and other tools, making it convenient for businesses to manage customer interactions.
  4. Pricing: Pricing for eServeCloud Chat can vary depending on the features and number of users you need. It typically offers a range of plans to accommodate different business sizes.

Overall, eServeCloud Chat can be a good choice for businesses looking for a simple and effective live chat solution.
